subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: If an electrical switch, outlet, socket or the like is accommodated in an opening or recess in a wall, floor or ceiling—

ol.li:
the opening or recess must not—
be located opposite any point within 300 mm horizontally or 600 mm vertically of any opening or recess on the opposite side of the wall; or
extend beyond half the thickness of the wall; and
the gap between the service and the wall, floor or ceiling must be fire-stopped in accordance with S13C7.
